	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> source1

Join alterRow(insertIf(notEquals(source1@material_num,source2@material_num)),
	updateIf(equals(source1@material_num,source2@material_num))) ~> AlterRow
source1, source2 join(source1@material_num == source2@material_num,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join
